__e: You see, Nikita, you are here for a very special reason.
What am I... this isn't about Nikita, and you know it.
You've never been good at following my orders. So don't expect me to follow yours.
'Cause I'm the only one that knows where Nikita is.
What matters is that Nikita is back under my control.
As far as what Nikita's going through, I-- the best way to avoid an RPG?
